posts.message:
[align=center][img]http://i.minus.com/jIYOEKIzEXsYR.png[/img][/align]

I wish to apologize for the delay of our 100th edition. Everything seemed to go wrong this edition, so it will be released tomorrow, on Sunday the 15th.

Please don't complain, the stress that has occurred in the last ten hours would be enough to pop an artery. 

-Sir
posts.subject: [7/14/12] - HF News Notice
